[vc_row content_placement=”middle” the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our office is located right in the center of the most dynamic cities in Southeast Asia, Ho Chi Minh City.

[/vc_column_text][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

ADDRESS
TS1-02.21, Tresor Residence, 39-39B Ben Van Don, ward 12, district 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
phone
+84 28 3925 2829
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
email
General Information: info@pulse.vn / Registration: registration@pulse.vn / For Sponsorship: sponsor@pulse.vn / For media: marketing@pulse.vn
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”text-center”][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Don't Be Shy, Send Us A

MESSAGE
[vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
